oops sorry I hurt your riven maining feelings :(
Garen hard counters most things now but knowing a well played Riven can overpower a Garen in lane doesn't really reassure me.

i honestly think you just don't want to accept that while she is strong, can be countered. i also believe your not willing to learn how to achieve this.

as far as i'm concerned, your closed minded in your opinion. and no-one but yourself will change that.

i wish you the best of luck
You just need to shut her down early and stop her from snowballing.
its hard to shutdown my turret diving jungler.

There is actually a very simple way to play against riven, ill tell it in steps:



Step 1: leave lane (this is to prevent frustration as she kills you with mindless repetition)

Step 2: Tell other players to leave lanes (this is to prevent roam and your teamates getting frustrated as she kills them with mindless repetition) 

Step 3: Walk to base with your team (this is prevent you or your team acting upon that little voice in your head that says "Im sure i can take her")

Step 4: Talk amongst yourselves until 20 minute mark (this is to prevent boredom) 

Step 5: when the game reaches 20 minutes, surrender (this is to prevent any more of your life being wasted) 

WARNING: Step 5 may not be necessary if they kill your nexus before 20 min, if this is the case retire to the fountain as they enter your base and no not leave for the duration, conversation amongst yourselves may continue unhindered.
